titles.title: Senior Home Modification Assistance Initiative Act
Senior Home Modification Assistance Initiative Act

A bill to amend the Older Americans Act of 1965 to establish an initiative, carried out by the Assistant Secretary for Aging, to coordinate Federal efforts and programs for home modifications enabling older individuals to live independently and safely in a home environment, and for other purposes.
Senior Home Modification Assistance Initiative Act
